page.title: 10PILSLEY P.S. VISITS MINEHEAD
page.content:
Our school holiday in 1985 was at Minehead. We went from the 13th April to the 20th. We went by Hogg's Coaches and we stopped at Bristol for lunch. Later on we went to the Fleet Air Arm Museum at Yeovilton. We had to stay in chalets at the Butlin's Camp. In our chalet there were four people. We did activities like abseiling, swimming, netball, craft and football. My favourite activities were abseiling and trampolining. We had days out as well, like Combe Sydenham Elizabethan Manor House and we went to Watchet on the West Somerset Railway. Later on we went to Blue Anchor beach. On Friday we went shopping and on Saturday we came home.
Rachel (10)
